messages.message: Do we use ElasticSearch / OpenSearch for anything besides search?

By search do you mean the search feature in the main sidebar? Off the top of my head we also use Elasticsearch/Opensearch for jaeger traces and several metrics frameworks (metrics app, flow reviewer metrics, the incoming automation metrics dashboard in 23.04)

Perfect, thank you :slightly_smiling_face:
I was curious if we were using it for any data science-y things, but I don’t think we are at this time
There absolutely could be other uses that I’m not aware of. <#C01DJ7QDC2H|> would know more than me
We are also using the ES/OS for auditlogs and document search as well
